entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning this evening and ending after midnight. Clearing before morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 26 February 2023
